title: Java Basics
content: Variables, Data Types, Operators, If-Else, Loops, Arrays.

title: OOP Concepts
content: Class, Object, Constructor, Inheritance, Polymorphism, Encapsulation.

title: Advanced Topics
content: Multithreading, File Handling, Exception Handling, Collections Framework.

title: Tips & Tricks
content: Use meaningful variable names, keep code modular, comment your code.
